summary: Three adolescent war orphans seclude themselves in an anarchic and playful existence of denial and juvenile joy.
cast: Philippe Avron|Jirí Sýkora|Magda Vásáryová|Francoise Goldité|Míla Beran|Mikulás Ladizinský|Jana Stehnová|Augustín Kubán
keywords: murder of a pregnant woman|czech new wave|written by director|budgerigar|magical realism
title: Vtáckovia, siroty a blázni
